The purpose of this file is to add new match data onto the profiles of each player

###########Functions unique to this file#####################
```{r}
WTennisStats<-read.csv("WTennisStats.csv")

MJonesNew<-filter(WTennisStats,WTennisStats$PlayerID=="Macie Jones")

N<-dim(MJonesNew)[1]

#Declaring variable's we'll use
Date<-"26jan2018"
Date<-as.Date(Date,"%d%b%Y")
FinalResult<-"Win"
BYUHand<-"R"
OppHand<-"R"


MJonesToInput <- data.frame(PlayerID=rep("Mayci Jones",times=N),
                     SeasonID=rep("-",times=N),
                     MatchID=rep("-",times=N),
                     Date=rep(Date,times=N),
                     HomeAway=rep("Home",times=N),
                     WinLoss=rep(FinalResult,times=N),
                     PlayerStyle=rep("-",times=N),
                     PlayerLR=rep(BYUHand,times=N),
                     OppStyle=rep("-",times=N),
                     OppLR=rep(OppHand,times=N),
                     PlayerSets=MJonesNew$PlayerSets,
                     OppSets=MJonesNew$OpponentSets,
                     GameID=rep("-",times=N),
                     PlayerGames=MJonesNew$PlayerGames,
                     OppGames=MJonesNew$OpponentGames,
                     Server=MJonesNew$Server,
                     PointID=rep("-",times=N),
                     PlayerPoints=MJonesNew$PlayerPoints,
                     OppPoints=MJonesNew$OpponentPoints,
                     ServeResult=MJonesNew$ServeResult,
                     ServeLocation=MJonesNew$ServeLocation,
                     ReturnLocation=MJonesNew$Returns,
                     Result=MJonesNew$PointResult,
                     PointWinner=MJonesNew$PointWinner,
                     FinalShotType=MJonesNew$ShotType,
                     FinalForeBack=MJonesNew$ForeBack,
                     FinalCrossLine=MJonesNew$CrossLine,
                     PenumltimateShotType=rep("-",times=N),
                     PenumltimateForeBack=rep("-",times=N),
                     PenumltimateCrossLine=rep("-",times=N),
                     NetPlay=rep("-",times=N),
                     PointLength=MJonesNew$PointLength,
                     ErrorPosition=MJonesNew$ErrorPosition,
                     Comments=MJonesNew$Comment,
                 stringsAsFactors=FALSE)
```
